name: EDUARDO CARAMAZANA
resume_snippet: EDUARDO CARAMAZANA  SKILLS/SPECIAL QUALIFICATIONS:  Performed more than 50 clinical site audits worldwide (approximately 30 different clinical protocols, phases I to III, post authorization study and pediatric study). Performed approximately 10 system audits (mainly investigational medicinal product management and sponsor study file). Performed a wide range of international clinical site audits (phases: I-IV), process audits and served as a QA reference for the clinical trials assigned. EMA/FDA
